snippet: A bus operated by Zambia’s postal service that was carrying passengers smashed into two vehicles on Thursday, killing at least 53 people and injuring 22 others
abstract: Bus operated by Zambia's postal service smashes into two vehicles, killing 53 people and injuring 22.
lead_paragraph: A bus operated by Zambia’s postal service that was carrying passengers smashed into two vehicles on Thursday, killing at least 53 people and injuring 22 others

headline.seo: Passengers Killed After Bus Crash in Zambia
headline.main: Dozens Killed in Bus Crash in Zambia
headline.print_headline: Zambia: Dozens Killed in Bus Crash
